name: Russia KILLS Ukrainians
description:
Design is about creating, about helping people, about doing something useful...

But the world has changed, and it will never be the same again.


A week ago, Russia invaded Ukraine. For almost a week, the Russian military has been killing children, women, and the old.


Please help us!

All you have to do is to find information about Russia's war against Ukraine on the Internet, on YouTube, Facebook, or anywhere else. It's up to you to ignore or help the Ukrainians. 


Please don't ignore this message because Ukrainians today and you tomorrow!
